## **MBA Project**
 Study on the effect of embedded marketing in movies of regional language
in Kerala, India FEB-MAR 2011 The research was conducted on the
effectiveness of embedded marketing and the results. Respondents from
multiple demographic groups were surveyed and some of the industry
people were interviewed to do the study. The responses of the
questionnaire were statistically analyzed and resulted in a positive
correlation to the brand recollection but no direct dependence of
improvement of sales was observed.
